channel.title: SMF 74 Subtype 8 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 74 Subtype 8 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - al
item.description: Length of Rank Array data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748AL Description Length of Rank Array data section

item.title: Field - altvm
item.description: Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fla.

item.title: Field - an
item.description: Number of Rank Array data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748AN Description Number of Rank Array data section

item.title: Field - ao
item.description: Offset to Rank Array data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748AO Description Offset to Rank Array data section

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Description SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cl
item.description: Length of link control section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748CL Description Length of link control section

item.title: Field - cn
item.description: Number of link control sections Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748CN Description Number of link control sections

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Data converted from version 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - co
item.description: Offset to link control section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748CO Description Offset to link control section

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74CYC Description Sampling cycle length

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74DAT Description Date monitor interval start

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74DTE

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74DTE Description DATE RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Speed boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74FLA Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74FLG Description SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74GIE Description Projected gathering interval end GMT time

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IET Description Interval expiration time token

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description zIIP boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IML Description Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74INT Description Duration of monitor interval

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: Time monitor interval start Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IST Description Time monitor interval start

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74LEN Description SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74LGO Description Offset GMT to local time

item.title: Field - ll
item.description: Length of link data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748LL Description Length of link data section

item.title: Field - ln
item.description: Number of link data sections Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748LN Description Number of link data sections

item.title: Field - lo
item.description: Offset to link data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748LO Description Offset to link data section

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Record was written by RMF Monitor III Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MFV Description RMF version number

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MVS Description MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm)

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74OIL Description Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds)

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Description OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRD Description Product name

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRF Description Processor flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74PRL Description LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74PRN Description NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74PRS Description OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PTN Description PR/SM partition number

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - r748aacp
item.description: Array capacity in GB Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AACP Description Array capacity in GB

item.title: Field - r748aaid
item.description: Rank array identifier Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AAID Description Rank array identifier

item.title: Field - r748aasp
item.description: Array speed in 1000 RPM Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AASP Description Array speed in 1000 RPM

item.title: Field - r748aast
item.description: Array device class and Array status Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AAST Description Array device class and Array status

item.title: Field - r748aawd
item.description: Array width Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AAWD Description Array width

item.title: Field - r748adc
item.description: Array device class 00 = Enterprise 01 = Near-line 10 = SATA 11 = Solid state drive Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748ADC Description Array device class 00 = Enterprise 01 = Near-line 10 = SATA 11 = Solid state drive Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748ard 2 ‘1’ = Raid degraded r748adt 3 ‘1’ = DDM throttling r748are 4 ‘1’ = RPM exception

item.title: Field - r748adt
item.description: ‘1’ = DDM throttling Map: R748ARRY Based on: r748adc Description ‘1’ = DDM throttling Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r748adc.

item.title: Field - r748aebc
item.description: Array type in EBCDIC Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AEBC Description Array type in EBCDIC

item.title: Field - r748ard
item.description: ‘1’ = Raid degraded Map: R748ARRY Based on: r748adc Description ‘1’ = Raid degraded Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r748adc.

item.title: Field - r748are
item.description: ‘1’ = RPM exception Map: R748ARRY Based on: r748adc Description ‘1’ = RPM exception Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r748adc.

item.title: Field - r748arid
item.description: Rank identfier Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748ARID Description Rank identfier

item.title: Field - r748atyp
item.description: Array type 01 = RAID-5, 02 = RAID-10, 03 = RAID-6, 04-FF Not used Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748ATYP Description Array type 01 = RAID-5, 02 = RAID-10, 03 = RAID-6, 04-FF Not used

item.title: Field - r748cae
item.description: Abend Code (SDWACMPC) System and User completion code (12 bits each) Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CAE Description Abend Code (SDWACMPC) System and User completion code (12 bits each)

item.title: Field - r748cdev
item.description: Device number of device that statistics where read from Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CDEV Description Device number of device that statistics where read from

item.title: Field - r748cfci
item.description: Interval length of first record (Reserved for duration processing) Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFCI Description Interval length of first record (Reserved for duration processing)

item.title: Field - r748cfdt
item.description: Date when first record was written (Reserved for duration processing) Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFDT Description Date when first record was written (Reserved for duration processing)

item.title: Field - r748cfdv
item.description: Failing device Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFDV Description Failing device

item.title: Field - r748cflg
item.description: Flags Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFLG Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748cxvl 0 Extent Pool statistics valid

item.title: Field - r748cfsc
item.description: Subchannel set ID of failing device Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFSC Description Subchannel set ID of failing device

item.title: Field - r748cftm
item.description: Time when first record was written (Reserved for duration processing) Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFTM Description Time when first record was written (Reserved for duration processing)

item.title: Field - r748cint
item.description: Number of seconds since statistics last collected Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CINT Description Number of seconds since statistics last collected

item.title: Field - r748cioc
item.description: IOS return code. If not zero, no link statistic data sections Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CIOC Description IOS return code. If not zero, no link statistic data sections

item.title: Field - r748clvl
item.description: Gatherer level Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CLVL Description Gatherer level

item.title: Field - r748cmdl
item.description: CU MoDeL Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CMDL Description CU MoDeL

item.title: Field - r748crtn
item.description: IDCSS01 return code Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CRTN Description IDCSS01 return code

item.title: Field - r748csc
item.description: Status code 00 = successful processed, 04 = IOS return code R748CIOC ^= 0, 08 = IDCSS01 return code R748CRTN ^= 0, 98 = SYSTEM or USER ABEND R748CAE ^= 0 Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CSC Description Status code 00 = successful processed, 04 = IOS return code R748CIOC ^= 0, 08 = IDCSS01 return code R748CRTN ^= 0, 98 = SYSTEM or USER ABEND R748CAE ^= 0

item.title: Field - r748cscs
item.description: ID of the subchannel set which is physically configured to the device from which statistics are measured Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CSCS Description ID of the subchannel set which is physically configured to the device from which statistics are measured

item.title: Field - r748cser
item.description: Primary CU serial number Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CSER Description Primary CU serial number

item.title: Field - r748ctyp
item.description: CU TYPe Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CTYP Description CU TYPe

item.title: Field - r748cvol
item.description: Volume serial of device that statistics where read from Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CVOL Description Volume serial of device that statistics where read from

item.title: Field - r748cvsn
item.description: VerSioN of link statistics definition 00 = Original length of link statistics 01 = Link statistics extended 02 = Link statistics V2 format Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CVSN Description VerSioN of link statistics definition 00 = Original length of link statistics 01 = Link statistics extended 02 = Link statistics V2 format

item.title: Field - r748cxvl
item.description: Extent Pool statistics valid Map: R748CNTL Based on: r748cflg Description Extent Pool statistics valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r748cflg.

item.title: Field - r748laid
item.description: Adapter ID Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LAID Description Adapter ID

item.title: Field - r748lbyt
item.description: On = Units of bytes indeterminable. Byte values incorrect. Map: R748LSS Based on: r748lflg Description On = Units of bytes indeterminable. Byte values incorrect. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r748lflg.

item.title: Field - r748lerb
item.description: ECKD architecture Read in units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LERB Description ECKD architecture Read in units of 128K bytes (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748lero
item.description: ECKD architecture Read Operations. For ESCON ports, one count per chain which transfers customer data to the host. For FICON ports, one count per command which transfers customer data to the host (long floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LERO Description ECKD architecture Read Operations. For ESCON ports, one count per chain which transfers customer data to the host. For FICON ports, one count per command which transfers customer data to the host (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lert
item.description: ECKD architecture Read accumulated time on channel in milliseconds. The active processing time for each command is accumulated (long floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LERT Description ECKD architecture Read accumulated time on channel in milliseconds. The active processing time for each command is accumulated (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lewb
item.description: ECKD architecture Write units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LEWB Description ECKD architecture Write units of 128K bytes (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748lewo
item.description: ECKD architecture Write Operations. For ESCON ports, one count per chain which transfers customer data from the host. For FICON ports, one count per command which transfers customer data from the host (long floating point). Note: A chain on an ESCON port that has read and write commands is counted as a read chain. Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LEWO Description ECKD architecture Write Operations. For ESCON ports, one count per chain which transfers customer data from the host.

item.title: Field - r748lewt
item.description: ECKD architecture Write accumulated time on channel in milliseconds. The active processing time for each command is accumulated (long floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LEWT Description ECKD architecture Write accumulated time on channel in milliseconds. The active processing time for each command is accumulated (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfbc
item.description: Fibre Channel bit error rate Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFBC Description Fibre Channel bit error rate

item.title: Field - r748lfcr
item.description: Fibre Channel cyclic redundancy check (CRC) errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFCR Description Fibre Channel cyclic redundancy check (CRC) errors (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfdf
item.description: Fibre Channel duplicate frame errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFDF Description Fibre Channel duplicate frame errors (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfif
item.description: Fibre Channel illegal frame errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFIF Description Fibre Channel illegal frame errors (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfio
item.description: Fibre Channel invalid relative offset failures (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFIO Description Fibre Channel invalid relative offset failures (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfit
item.description: Fibre Channel invalid transmission word errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFIT Description Fibre Channel invalid transmission word errors (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lflf
item.description: Fibre Channel link failures (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFLF Description Fibre Channel link failures (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lflg
item.description: Flags Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFLG Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748lbyt 0 On = Units of bytes indeterminable. Byte values incorrect. r748ltim 1 On = Units of time indeterminable. Time values incorrect.

item.title: Field - r748lfls
item.description: Fibre Channel signal failures (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFLS Description Fibre Channel signal failures (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfly
item.description: Fibre Channel synchronization failures (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFLY Description Fibre Channel synchronization failures (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfoa
item.description: Fibre Channel out of order ACK errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFOA Description Fibre Channel out of order ACK errors (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfod
item.description: Fibre Channel out of order data errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFOD Description Fibre Channel out of order data errors (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfpq
item.description: Number of Fibre Channel primitive sequnece errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFPQ Description Number of Fibre Channel primitive sequnece errors (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfr1
item.description: Fibre Channel link recovery (LR) sent (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFR1 Description Fibre Channel link recovery (LR) sent (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfr2
item.description: Fibre Channel link recovery (LR) received (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFR2 Description Fibre Channel link recovery (LR) received (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lftc
item.description: Fibre Channel sequence timeout errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFTC Description Fibre Channel sequence timeout errors (short floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lprb
item.description: PPRC Received in units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPRB Description PPRC Received in units of 128K bytes (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748lpro
item.description: PPRC Received Operations. Each PPRC write command received by the PPRC secondary (long floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPRO Description PPRC Received Operations. Each PPRC write command received by the PPRC secondary (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lprt
item.description: PPRC Received accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPRT Description PPRC Received accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748lpsb
item.description: PPRC Sent in units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPSB Description PPRC Sent in units of 128K bytes (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748lpso
item.description: PPRC Sent Operations. Each PPRC write command sent by the PPRC primary (long floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPSO Description PPRC Sent Operations. Each PPRC write command sent by the PPRC primary (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lpst
item.description: PPRC Sent accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPST Description PPRC Sent accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748lsrb
item.description: SCSI Read in units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSRB Description SCSI Read in units of 128K bytes (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748lsro
item.description: SCSI Read Operations. Each customer read operation is counted (long floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSRO Description SCSI Read Operations. Each customer read operation is counted (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lsrt
item.description: SCSI Read accumulated time on channel in milliseconds (long floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSRT Description SCSI Read accumulated time on channel in milliseconds (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lswb
item.description: SCSI Write in units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSWB Description SCSI Write in units of 128K bytes (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748lswo
item.description: SCSI Write Operations. Each customer write operation is counted (long floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSWO Description SCSI Write Operations. Each customer write operation is counted (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lswt
item.description: SCSI Write accumulated time on channel in milliseconds (long floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSWT Description SCSI Write accumulated time on channel in milliseconds (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748ltim
item.description: On = Units of time indeterminable. Time values incorrect. Map: R748LSS Based on: r748lflg Description On = Units of time indeterminable. Time values incorrect. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r748lflg.

item.title: Field - r748ltyp
item.description: Link type 1 ESCON 2 Fibre Channel 1 Gb/s 3 Fibre Channel 2 Gb/s 4 Fibre Channel 4 Gb/s 5 Fibre Channel 8 Gb/s 6 Fibre Channel 16 Gb/s 10 Ethernet Channel 10 Gb/s Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LTYP Description Link type 1 ESCON 2 Fibre Channel 1 Gb/s 3 Fibre Channel 2 Gb/s 4 Fibre Channel 4 Gb/s 5 Fibre Channel 8 Gb/s 6 Fibre Channel 16 Gb/s 10 Ethernet Channel 10 Gb/s

item.title: Field - r748rai
item.description: Rank adapter pair id Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RAI Description Rank adapter pair id

item.title: Field - r748raiv
item.description: ‘1’ = Rank adapter pair id valid Map: R748RANK Based on: r748rtq Description ‘1’ = Rank adapter pair id valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r748rtq.

item.title: Field - r748raix
item.description: Index to first array section of rank Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RAIX Description Index to first array section of rank

item.title: Field - r748rbyr
item.description: Rank 128 KBYtes read. (long floating point) Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RBYR Description Rank 128 KBYtes read. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748rbyw
item.description: Rank 128 KBYtes write. (long floating point) Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RBYW Description Rank 128 KBYtes write. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748rcnt
item.description: Count of arrays in rank Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RCNT Description Count of arrays in rank

item.title: Field - r748rkrt
item.description: Rank read response time in units of 16 milliseconds. (long floating point) Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RKRT Description Rank read response time in units of 16 milliseconds. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748rkwt
item.description: Rank write response time in units of 16 milliseconds. (long floating point) Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RKWT Description Rank write response time in units of 16 milliseconds. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748rpnm
item.description: Extent pool number Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RPNM Description Extent pool number

item.title: Field - r748rrid
item.description: Rank identifier Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RRID Description Rank identifier

item.title: Field - r748rrop
item.description: Rank read operations. (long floating point) Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RROP Description Rank read operations. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748rtcr
item.description: ‘1’ = Data encrypted rank Map: R748RANK Based on: r748rtq Description ‘1’ = Data encrypted rank Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r748rtq.

item.title: Field - r748rtq
item.description: Rank type qualifer Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RTQ Description Rank type qualifer Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748rtcr 0 ‘1’ = Data encrypted rank r748raiv 7 ‘1’ = Rank adapter pair id valid

item.title: Field - r748rwop
item.description: Rank write operations. (long floating point) Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RWOP Description Rank write operations. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748sbyt
item.description: On = Units of bytes indeterminable. Byte values incorrect. Map: R748SIOL Based on: r748sflg Description On = Units of bytes indeterminable. Byte values incorrect. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r748sflg.

item.title: Field - r748scbr
item.description: Synchronous I/O cache bytes read in units of 128K bytes. (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCBR Description Synchronous I/O cache bytes read in units of 128K bytes. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scbw
item.description: Synchronous I/O cache bytes written in units of 128K bytes. (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCBW Description Synchronous I/O cache bytes written in units of 128K bytes. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scro
item.description: Total number of synchronous I/O cache read operations. (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCRO Description Total number of synchronous I/O cache read operations. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scrs
item.description: Number of successful synchronous I/O cache read operations. (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCRS Description Number of successful synchronous I/O cache read operations. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scrt
item.description: Synchronous I/O cache read accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCRT Description Synchronous I/O cache read accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scwo
item.description: Total number of synchronous I/O cache write operations. (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCWO Description Total number of synchronous I/O cache write operations. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scws
item.description: Number of successful synchronous I/O cache write operations. (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCWS Description Number of successful synchronous I/O cache write operations. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scwt
item.description: Synchronous I/O cache write accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCWT Description Synchronous I/O cache write accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748sflg
item.description: Flags Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SFLG Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748sbyt 0 On = Units of bytes indeterminable. Byte values incorrect. r748stim 1 On = Units of time indeterminable. Time values incorrect.

item.title: Field - r748siid
item.description: Synchronous I/O link interface identifier. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SIID Description Synchronous I/O link interface identifier.

item.title: Field - r748snbw
item.description: Synchronous I/O NVS bytes written in units of 128K bytes. (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SNBW Description Synchronous I/O NVS bytes written in units of 128K bytes. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748snwo
item.description: Total number of synchronous I/O NVS write operations. (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SNWO Description Total number of synchronous I/O NVS write operations. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748snws
item.description: Number of successful synchronous I/O NVS write operations. (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SNWS Description Number of successful synchronous I/O NVS write operations. (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748snwt
item.description: Synchronous I/O NVS write accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SNWT Description Synchronous I/O NVS write accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748sspd
item.description: Synchronous I/O link type. 00 Not used 01 PCIe Gen 1 02 PCIe Gen 2 03 PCIe Gen 3 04 PCIe Gen 4 05-FF Not used Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SSPD Description Synchronous I/O link type. 00 Not used 01 PCIe Gen 1 02 PCIe Gen 2 03 PCIe Gen 3 04 PCIe Gen 4 05-FF Not used

item.title: Field - r748sste
item.description: Synchronous I/O link type. 00 Not used 01 Link not trained 02 Link handshake incomplete 03 Link handshake complete, link operational 04 Link in service mode 05-FF Not used Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SSTE Description Synchronous I/O link type. 00 Not used 01 Link not trained 02 Link handshake incomplete 03 Link handshake complete, link operational 04 Link in service mode 05-FF Not used

item.title: Field - r748stim
item.description: On = Units of time indeterminable. Time values incorrect. Map: R748SIOL Based on: r748sflg Description On = Units of time indeterminable. Time values incorrect. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r748sflg.

item.title: Field - r748styp
item.description: Synchronous I/O link type. 00 Not used 01 Optical PCIe 02-FF Not used Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748STYP Description Synchronous I/O link type. 00 Not used 01 Optical PCIe 02-FF Not used

item.title: Field - r748swdh
item.description: Synchronous I/O link width. This is the number of PCIe lanes. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SWDH Description Synchronous I/O link width. This is the number of PCIe lanes.

item.title: Field - r748xpid
item.description: Extent pool identifier Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XPID Description Extent pool identifier

item.title: Field - r748xplt
item.description: Extent pool type 00-03 = RESERVED, 04 = FB 1Gb, 05-131 = RESERVED, 132 = CKD 1Gb, 133-255 = RESERVED Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XPLT Description Extent pool type 00-03 = RESERVED, 04 = FB 1Gb, 05-131 = RESERVED, 132 = CKD 1Gb, 133-255 = RESERVED

item.title: Field - r748xptq
item.description: Extent pool type qualifier Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XPTQ Description Extent pool type qualifier Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748xtcr 0 ‘1’ = Data encrpted extent pool

item.title: Field - r748xrcp
item.description: Real extent pool capacity in GB Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XRCP Description Real extent pool capacity in GB

item.title: Field - r748xrna
item.description: Number of real allocated extents in extent pool Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XRNA Description Number of real allocated extents in extent pool

item.title: Field - r748xrns
item.description: Number of real extents in extent pool Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XRNS Description Number of real extents in extent pool

item.title: Field - r748xrsc
item.description: Real extent conversions. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XRSC Description Real extent conversions. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - r748xsdy
item.description: Number of extents that were sources of dynamic extent relocations. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XSDY Description Number of extents that were sources of dynamic extent relocations. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - r748xtcr
item.description: ‘1’ = Data encrpted extent pool Map: R748EXTP Based on: r748xptq Description ‘1’ = Data encrpted extent pool Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r748xptq.

item.title: Field - r748xtdy
item.description: Number of extents that were targets of dynamic extent relocations. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XTDY Description Number of extents that were targets of dynamic extent relocations. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - r748xvcp
item.description: Virtual extent pool capacity in GB. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XVCP Description Virtual extent pool capacity in GB. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - r748xvns
item.description: Number of virtual extents in extent pool. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XVNS Description Number of virtual extents in extent pool. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - r748xvsc
item.description: Virtual extent conversions. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XVSC Description Virtual extent conversions. Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAL Description Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAN Description Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAO Description Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rl
item.description: Length of Rank statistics data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748RL Description Length of Rank statistics data section

item.title: Field - rn
item.description: Number of Rank statistics data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748RN Description Number of Rank statistics data section

item.title: Field - ro
item.description: Offset to Rank statistics data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748RO Description Offset to Rank statistics data section

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Description NEW RECORD FORMAT Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74RTY Description RECORD TYPE

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SAM Description Number of samples

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74SEG Description SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74SID Description SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION

item.title: Field - sl
item.description: Length of Synchronous I/O Link Statistics data sect. Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748SL Description Length of Synchronous I/O Link Statistics data sect.

item.title: Field - sn
item.description: Number of Synchronous I/O Link Statistics data sect. Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748SN Description Number of Synchronous I/O Link Statistics data sect.

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SNM Description System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME

item.title: Field - so
item.description: Offset to Synchronous I/O Link Statistics data sect. Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748SO Description Offset to Synchronous I/O Link Statistics data sect.

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SRL Description SMF record level

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74SSI Description SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF )

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74STY Description SUBTYPE

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Description SUBTYPES USED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SYN Description SYNC value in seconds

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF74S8 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TIME RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74TME Description TIME RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74TRN Description NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Description MVS/XA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xl
item.description: Length of Extent pool data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748XL Description Length of Extent pool data section

item.title: Field - xn
item.description: Number of Extent pool data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748XN Description Number of Extent pool data section

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74XNM Description Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX

item.title: Field - xo
item.description: Offset to Extent pool data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748XO Description Offset to Extent pool data section
